messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: At approximately 3:05 AM, 14 August 2023 -Detective HOPPER, With Detective Sergeant Greene and Mr. Ronald Hendricks met. Station location Central Sheriff's Office, 144 Main Street, Hillstown. Ronald very Distraught -not much COHERENCE in initial discussion.  By 3:45 AM, on the day, Technician Annie Patterson of Sheriff's Crime Scene Division arrives, Meeting Detective Hopper. Hopper handed a broken glass bottle, believed to be the Assault tool. Patterson Photographs a 4-inch cut on Hendricks' upper arm. Patterson reported driving VEHICLE S. 489 this Time.  CONTINUED FOR TRANSMISSION TO:  DETECTIVE BUREAU Detective M. Hopper Windy and Dark that NIGHT. Detective Hopper and Sergeant Greene arrived at Hillstown Diner, Near 119 CEDAR Hill Lane, by 4:12 AM. Floor wet - possible rain entry or spill?  Tech Greg Roman from Crime Scene Division: processing. Diner's corner shows broken chairs. Roman captured pictures of shattered GLASS on floor. Footprints found - but smeared. Maybe multiple SUSPECTS?  Diner Employee - Jane Miles, Points out to Suspicious man earlier. Tattoo on neck, Dragon-like. Left diner in a HURRY post-incident. Other witnesses: Not much Help.  15 August 2023, Detective Hopper gets call from Patrolman Derek Winters. Winters seen tattooed male, Hillstown Bridge Area. Name: Terry Wilson, known to LOCALS. Not cooperative. Detained for questioning.  At the noon hour, Hopper introduces Hendricks to Line-up at Investigations Division. Hendricks views six images. He identifies Wilson. BUT unsure about second attacker, if any.  This lineup, snapped by Tech Roman. 12:40 PM, same date: Attorney Laura Richards is there but Silent throughout.  Report also Includes: Statement from Jane Miles, details of Wilson's prior offenses, and - information from the LINE-UP. These Documents, in essence, part of the whole report.  '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph:
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Detective Hopper Officer Context: At approximately 3:05 AM, 14 August 2023, Detective Hopper, with Detective Sergeant Greene and Mr. Ronald Hendricks met at the Central Sheriff's Office. By 3:45 AM, on the same day, Technician Annie Patterson arrives, meeting Detective Hopper. Windy and dark that night, Detective Hopper and Sergeant Greene arrived at Hillstown Diner. On 15 August 2023, Detective Hopper received a call from Patrolman Derek Winters. At noon, Hopper introduces Hendricks to a line-up at the Investigations Division. Officer Role: Detective  Officer Name: Detective Sergeant Greene Officer Context: At approximately 3:05 AM, 14 August 2023, Detective Hopper, with Detective Sergeant Greene and Mr. Ronald Hendricks met at the Central Sheriff's Office. Later that night, Detective Hopper and Sergeant Greene arrived at Hillstown Diner. Officer Role: Detective Sergeant  Officer Name: Technician Annie Patterson Officer Context: By 3:45 AM, on the day, Technician Annie Patterson of Sheriff's Crime Scene Division arrives, meeting Detective Hopper. Hopper handed her a broken glass bottle, believed to be the assault tool. Patterson photographs a 4-inch cut on Hendricks' upper arm. Patterson reported driving vehicle S. 489 at that time. Officer Role: Technician  Officer Name: Tech Greg Roman Officer Context: Tech Greg Roman from Crime Scene Division was processing at the Hillstown Diner. Roman captured pictures of shattered glass on the floor. The line-up was also snapped by Tech Roman at 12:40 PM on the same date. Officer Role: Technician  Officer Name: Patrolman Derek Winters Officer Context: On 15 August 2023, Detective Hopper gets a call from Patrolman Derek Winters. Winters had seen a tattooed male, Terry Wilson, in the Hillstown Bridge Area. Officer Role: Patrolman
